title: Minisuka Police (2004) DVD 02 of 10 DVDRip OGM Japanese
description:

   must install the following codecs:

Please help me seed, for I can't leave my computer on 24/7.


ABOUT THE CONTENT

??!??????? (2004)
Let's Go! Minisuka Police (2004) - Best episodes collection, DVD 2 of 10.

Starring:

????     Mie Nanamori
?????   Rika Ikeda
?????   Maika Ikemoto
?????   Akane Kanazawa


This is the 2nd DVD from the 10-DVD Minisuka Police box set. It features the top three best episodes from the second batch of Minisuka Police, plus an extra.

Language: Japanese, no subtitles

Background:

This is a sort of a late-night reality/gag TV show featuring models dressed in sexy police uniform, wearing short skirts ("minisuka" refers to "miniskirt").

The models are assigned to do various tasks ranging from playing games to doing sexy poses to catching lizards -- anything that makes them accidentally expose their underwear. This is the ultimate upskirts show. ("Upskirt" is "panchira" (????) in Japanese).

As of this writing, there are 13 batches of Minisuka Police in all. The first batch was aired in 1996.


SEASON vs. BATCH

In the README file of DVD 3, I called the series "the third season". I realized that the term "season" is inaccurate. In Japanese terminology, DVD 3 contains the three best episodes of "Sandaime Minisuka Police" (3?????????). "Sandaime" literally means "third generation", not "third season". Seasons are yearly, but "generations" are not necessarily yearly. In fact, the second set ("Nidaime" 2??) of Minisuka Police episodes was aired in Japan from January to March 1997, while the third set ("Sandaime" 3??) was aired from April to June 1997, and the fourth set ("Yondaime" 4??) was aired from July 1997 to March 1998.

So when it comes to the Japanese usage of "generation", the word "batch" is much closer in meaning than "season", and it's also the shortest to type. Hence, from now on I'll use the word "batch" to refer to a set of episodes and also to the girls in that set as well.
